name: places/ChIJLVtwqxtawokRIM9SI8BH4rM
formattedAddress: 225 Liberty St #220, New York, NY 10281, USA
adrFormatAddress: 225 Liberty St #220, New York, NY 10281, USA

editorialSummary.text: Upmarket retailer of scented products such as colognes, bath oils, soaps & candles.

originalText.text: I received my parcel yesterday and am very upset. There was no gift wrapping or samples, and your customer service suggested that the courier opened the box and stole the wrapping and samples. This is ridiculous. I had hoped to receive a gift in a beautiful package, as stated on your website, but instead, I received a bottle of perfume dangling in a shipping box.

text.text: I received my parcel yesterday and am very upset. There was no gift wrapping or samples, and your customer service suggested that the courier opened the box and stole the wrapping and samples. This is ridiculous. I had hoped to receive a gift in a beautiful package, as stated on your website, but instead, I received a bottle of perfume dangling in a shipping box.

originalText.text: Such an incredible store and welcoming staff! The entire staff is kind and warm. Sharifa is the most knowledgable person I've ever met when it comes to scents. She is super patient and very insightful, I have been purchasing from this store for over a year and plan to continue as long as Sharifa is there!

text.text: Such an incredible store and welcoming staff! The entire staff is kind and warm. Sharifa is the most knowledgable person I've ever met when it comes to scents. She is super patient and very insightful, I have been purchasing from this store for over a year and plan to continue as long as Sharifa is there!

originalText.text:
My recent in-store experience left me with a deeply disappointing impression, contrary to my expectations. I had the opportunity to interact with two of your saleswomen, one in her twenties and the other of an older age, unfortunately, neither of them showed the slightest consideration towards me as a loyal customer of your brand.

Their haughty demeanor and lack of interest resulted in making me feel profoundly uncomfortable. As a devoted patron of your establishment, this is the first time I have encountered such a disappointment in customer service.

This experience was in stark contrast to my previous visits to Jo Malone at Galeries Lafayette Paris-Haussmann, where the saleswomen consistently exhibit exquisite attention to customers, offering valuable advice and creating an exceptionally pleasant shopping experience. In contrast, during my visit to your store, every question, especially regarding the olfactory notes of a product, seemed to be met with sighs of annoyance.

I genuinely hope that concrete measures will be taken to enhance the level of service in your establishment. It is important to note that your store, situated in a magnificent location, possesses immense potential that could be further harnessed.

originalText.text: The best experience ever!!!! Went into this location 5 minutes before closing (of course I'm visiting from out of town) so I had no clue of closing hour. Sharifa and Angela made us feel so welcomed and not rushed at all. Really felt as if I was visiting old friends!!!!! Was able to select 2 new favorite fragrances that will be delivered to me soon. Again BEST EXPERIENCE EVER!!! Thank you ladies ❤️

originalText.text: beautiful shop, great range of elegant fragrances and great service.  Thank you so much for helping me choose Jauger Scott perfume, who showed me great service and gave me great emotions.  Now this brand will become my favorite and the most beautiful blueberry flavor is exactly what I wanted.
